snippet: A loss to Chelsea on Sunday left Manchester United 14 points behind Arsenal in England’s Premier League.
abstract: Chelsea defeats Manchester United, 3-1, in English Premier League soccer; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: A loss to Chelsea on Sunday left Manchester United 14 points behind Arsenal in England’s Premier League.

headline.main: Hat Trick by Eto’o Sinks Manchester United
headline.print_headline: Three Goals by Eto’o Power Chelsea’s Win
